author: wmtford
body: This PR replaces PR 4631.  It is built on the intended CMSSW_6_2_X_SLHC instead of the TkFix side branch, and in includes mods to prevent the performance blow-up seen in PR 4520 in 7_2_X.  The purpose again is to facilitate direct matching of recHits with simHits
title: New strip simlinks62 xslhc
